text: Mindy Kaling nailed her commencement speech at Dartmouth College ’ s graduation ceremony in Hanover, New Hampshire, on Sunday, June 10. In her 17 - minute address, the 38 - year - old, who graduated from the Ivy League institution in 2001, shared practical advice — buy a toilet plunger before you need one — and opened up about life as a single mother. The Mindy Project creator and star welcomed her daughter, Katherine Kaling, on December 15. She honored her late mom, Dr. Swati Roysircar, by choosing the middle name Swati for her first child.
